dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Hey, can you help me with this puzzle?

dialogue.speaker: Guide
dialogue.text: Sure, what seems to be the problem?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I'm stuck on this riddle. It says: "I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?"

dialogue.speaker: Guide
dialogue.text: The answer is an echo. The sound waves create the illusion of speech even though an echo itself does not physically speak. It doesn't have a body but it becomes alive when it reflects off surfaces.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Ah, I see! Thanks for the help!
